game.s_dis: G-Switch is a fast-paced runner game where you flip gravity to dodge obstacles and race across futuristic levels solo or with friends.
game.l_dis:
G-Switch – Master the Art of Gravity

G-Switch is a lightning-fast action-runner game where gravity is your greatest tool. With a simple tap, you flip gravity to run across floors, ceilings, and walls, avoiding deadly traps in a sleek futuristic world. Perfect timing and reflexes are the key to survival!

What is G-Switch?

G-Switch is a popular gravity-defying platform runner that challenges players to react quickly and keep up with the pace. Originally released as part of a hit series, the game includes solo mode, endless running, and multiplayer races.

How to Play G-Switch?

  • Tap/Click: Invert gravity to run on walls, ceilings, or floors.
  • Avoid Hazards: Watch out for gaps, saws, and obstacles.
  • Stay in Motion: The speed increases the longer you run.
  • Multiplayer Mode: Compete with up to 8 friends in chaotic races.

Why Play G-Switch Unblocked?

G-Switch Unblocked gives you access to the thrilling gravity-runner experience from anywhere—school, work, or home. No downloads needed, just pure fast-paced gameplay in your browser.

Key Features

  • Gravity Flipping: Switch between walls, floors, and ceilings.
  • Single-Tap Controls: Easy to learn, tough to master.
  • Endless & Story Modes: Test reflexes or progress through levels.
  • Multiplayer Fun: Up to 8 players can race together.
  • Unblocked Access: Play instantly with no restrictions.

Can You Handle the Speed?

G-Switch is the ultimate test of reflexes, timing, and precision. One wrong move, and gravity won’t save you. Flip fast, run far, and challenge your friends in this futuristic race for survival.
